messages.title: THIS IS YOUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: The Conservative Party is now the party of extreme hard Brexit. They risk damaging our children's future with their Single Market exit and cut host ties with our European neighbours. Bob Barr and the Liberal Democrats are fighting to give you the final say on the Brexit deal.

messages.title: A record of service—working for Warrington South
messages.content: Bob Barr has a strong record of service and fighting for our community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bob Barr and the Liberal Democrats are opposed to Conservative plans to cut school funding.
Stand up for the National Health Service to ensure everyone can receive good quality care.
Fighting against a hard Brexit and ensuring the final say on the Brexit deal.
Liberal Democrats have been foremost in pressing to bring health and care services together. They also championed giving equal status to mental health issues.
Believes the new Mersey Bridge tolls are a mistake and vows to add pressure on the government to address this issue.
Focused on protecting Warrington's economy from the negative impacts of a hard Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: RIGHT HOME IN THE RIGHT PLACE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to development of affordable and adequate housing, with concern for green spaces and garden land.

issues.brexitEurope: Bob Barr and the Liberal Democrats are fighting against a hard Brexit and ensuring the final say on the Brexit deal.
issues.economy: Focused on protecting Warrington's economy from the negative impacts of a hard Brexit and loss of existing science based industries.
issues.education: Bob Barr and the Liberal Democrats are opposed to Conservative plans to cut school funding.
issues.environment: The tolls from the new Mersey Bridge bring concerns about congestion and air pollution.
issues.health: Liberal Democrats have advocated for bringing health and care services together, and giving equal status to mental health issues.

housing.content: Commitment to development of affordable and adequate housing, with concern for green spaces and garden land.
